Description:
Mandatory Skills:Must have engineering degree Electronics /Instrumentation /Electrical /Computer
2 - 5yr Experience in System/Software Manual Testing.
Knowledge of Software Testing / development life cycle. (V-Model, CMMi, Agile) and Test processes.
Willing to Travel extensively as per business need and on short notice as well.
Knowledge of test tool (like Quality Center, Jira etc) and Basic Oracle Sql & PL/Sql & Unix
Writing test case & test plan.
Strong Communication and Interpreting and Analytical Skills.
Good Team Player, Proactive, Self-Lerner
Knowledge of Material Handling or Distribution System Domain or Field work would be and added advantage.Secondary Skills (Good to have) / Not MandatoryKnowledge PLC systems & SCADA systems
Having Project Engineering and Commissioning Experience
Experience in Quality Center.
Certification ISTQB or equivalentJob Details
